ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING A TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO PART 2 OF SCHEDULE 1 to the CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to list chlorhexidine and its salts.
